AT.name: Mario Golf™
AT.description: Entdecke das Abschlagen mit Mario und seinen Freunden, die dir Golf von einer ganz neuen Seite zeigen. Wähle aus 14 unterschiedlichen Charakteren mit jeweils ganz eigenen Fähigkeiten und Schwungtechniken. Du kannst sogar Gegner verspotten und somit ihre Konzentration beeinträchtigen! Mario Golf™ beinhaltet zahlreiche Funktionen, darunter 10 verschiedene Spielemodi wie Tournament [Turnier], Speed Golf [Spiel auf Zeit] oder sogar Mini-Golf. Beim Durchspielen der sechs verschiedenen Golfanlagen sammelst du Experience Points [Erfahrungspunkte] und machst dadurch Fortschritte. Dieses leicht zu erlernende Spiel mit Vier-Spieler-Modus lässt jeden zum Golfprofi werden! Wenn du diesen Titel bereits auf deiner Wii™ erworben hast, führe einen System-Transfer von deiner Wii auf deine Wii U™ durch, um ein Upgrade-Sonderangebot zu erhalten. Hierbei handelt es sich um die US-Version des Spiels.

AU.name: Mario Golf™
AU.description: Tee off with Mario and friends as they put a new spin on golf! Choose from 14 different characters, each with their own power and swing styles. You can even taunt opponents to break their concentration! Mario Golf™ is packed with features, including 10 different modes (such as Tournament, Speed Golf and even Mini-Golf), and six different courses to play through by earning Experience Points to progress. With easy-to-learn gameplay and a four-player competitive mode, anyone can get into the swing of Mario Golf! If you own this title on your Wii™, perform a system transfer from your Wii to your Wii U™ to receive a special upgrade price. This is the US version of the game.

BG.name: Mario Golf™
BG.description: Tee off with Mario and friends as they put a new spin on golf! Choose from 14 different characters, each with their own power and swing styles. You can even taunt opponents to break their concentration! Mario Golf™ is packed with features, including 10 different modes (such as Tournament, Speed Golf and even Mini-Golf), and six different courses to play through by earning Experience Points to progress. With easy-to-learn gameplay and a four-player competitive mode, anyone can get into the swing of Mario Golf! If you own this title on your Wii™, perform a system transfer from your Wii to your Wii U™ to receive a special upgrade price. This is the US version of the game.

BE.name: Mario Golf™
BE.description: Découvrez une nouvelle approche du golf avec Mario et ses amis ! Choisissez parmi 14 personnages différents, bénéficiant chacun d'un style et d'une puissance uniques. Vous pouvez même narguer vos adversaires pour les déconcentrer ! Mario Golf™ déborde de fonctionnalités, telles que 10 modes de jeu variés (Tournament [tournoi], Speed Golf [partie rapide] et même Mini-Golf [mini-golf]) et six terrains différents pour gagner des Experience Points [points d'expérience] afin de progresser. Grâce à une prise en main accessible et un mode quatre joueurs compétitif, tout le monde est capable de faire un swing à Mario Golf ! Si vous possédez ce titre sur votre Wii, faites un transfert Wii™ vers votre Wii U™ afin d'obtenir la version améliorée à un prix spécial ! Ceci est la version américaine du jeu.

CA.name: Mario Golf™
CA.description: Mario takes a well-deserved break from his role as the Mushroom Kingdom’s busiest hero and returns to the links for some world-class golfing action. Since no one likes to hit the fairways alone, he’s brought along a group of friends—both familiar characters and brand-new ones. Choose from 10 different modes of play and six 18-hole courses in a variety of environments for a golfing experience with endless replay value. Add fun, colorful graphics with a Mario touch, intuitive controls, incredibly deep gameplay, and multiplayer support into the mixture, and you have a game that anyone will enjoy—even if they’ve never played a round of golf!

ES.name: Mario Golf™
ES.description: ¡Da el golpe inicial con Mario y compañía y disfruta del golf desde una perspectiva diferente! Elige entre 14 personajes distintos, cada uno con su propia potencia y estilo. ¡Hasta puedes provocar a tus oponentes para que se desconcentren! Mario Golf™ es un juego con numerosas características, incluidos 10 modos diferentes (como Tournament [Torneo], Speed Golf [Golf rápido] e incluso Mini-Golf [Minigolf]) y seis recorridos distintos en los que jugar, donde deberás ganar Experience Points [puntos de experiencia] para avanzar en el juego. Con una dinámica intuitiva y un modo competitivo para cuatro jugadores, ¡disfrutar de Mario Golf está al alcance de todos! Si posees este título en tu Wii™, puedes realizar una transferencia de datos de Wii a Wii U™ y obtener una actualización a un precio especial. Esta es la versión estadounidense del juego.

IT.name: Mario Golf™
IT.description: Gioca a golf insieme a Mario e i suoi amici! Scegli fra 14 personaggi diversi, ognuno con la propria potenza e stile. Puoi anche infastidire gli avversari per fare perdere loro la concentrazione! Mario Golf™ è ricco di contenuti, incluse 10 modalità differenti (come Tournament (Torneo), Speed Golf (Golf rapido) e persino il Mini-Golf (minigolf)) e a 6 campi diversi in cui poter giocare e guadagnare Experience points (punti esperienza) per progredire. Con una modalità di gioco intuitiva e la modalità competizione a 4 giocatori chiunque può diventare un campione in Mario Golf! Se possiedi questo titolo sulla tua console Wii™, effettua un trasferimento dati su Wii U™ per potere ottenere la versione ottimizzata a un prezzo speciale! Questa è la versione americana del gioco.

MX.name: Mario Golf™
MX.description: Mario toma un merecido descanso de su rol como el héroe más ocupado del Reino Champiñón y regresa a los campos de golf por un poco de acción de clase mundial. Como a nadie le gusta jugar golf solo, Mario ha invitado a sus amigos que son tanto personajes ya conocidos como personajes nuevos. Escoge entre 10 modos de juego diferentes y seis campos de 18 hoyos, en una variedad de escenarios diferentes para una experiencia de golf que jamás te aburrirá. Junta diversión, gráficos coloridos con un toque de Mario, controles intuitivos, un modo de juego increíble y compatibilidad con el modo multijugador y obtienes un juego que todos disfrutarán, incluso quienes jamás han jugado golf.

NO.name: Mario Golf™
NO.description: Tee off with Mario and friends as they put a new spin on golf! Choose from 14 different characters, each with their own power and swing styles. You can even taunt opponents to break their concentration! Mario Golf™ is packed with features, including 10 different modes (such as Tournament, Speed Golf and even Mini-Golf), and six different courses to play through by earning Experience Points to progress. With easy-to-learn gameplay and a four-player competitive mode, anyone can get into the swing of Mario Golf! If you own this title on your Wii™, perform a system transfer from your Wii to your Wii U™ to receive a special upgrade price. This is the US version of the game.

NL.name: Mario Golf™
NL.description: Sla af met Mario en zijn vrienden, die golf een nieuwe draai geven! Kies uit veertien verschillende personages, ieder met hun eigen kracht en slagtechniek. Je kunt zelfs tegenstanders uitjouwen om hun concentratie te verbreken! Mario Golf™ zit boordevol functies, waaronder tien verschillende spelstanden, zoals Tournament (toernooi), Speed Golf (snelgolf) en zelfs Mini-Golf (midgetgolf), en zes verschillende golfbanen waar je op kunt spelen door Experience Points (ervaringspunten) te verdienen om verder te komen in het spel. Met makkelijk te leren gameplay en een wedstrijdstand voor vier spelers, kan iedereen een balletje meeslaan in Mario Golf! Als je deze titel hebt gekocht op je Wii™, kom je in aanmerking voor een speciale upgrade-prijs als je je gegevens overzet van Wii naar Wii U™. Dit is de Amerikaanse versie van het spel.

NZ.name: Mario Golf™
NZ.description: Tee off with Mario and friends as they put a new spin on golf! Choose from 14 different characters, each with their own power and swing styles. You can even taunt opponents to break their concentration! Mario Golf™ is packed with features, including 10 different modes (such as Tournament, Speed Golf and even Mini-Golf), and six different courses to play through by earning Experience Points to progress. PL.name: Mario Golf™

With easy-to-learn gameplay and a four-player competitive mode, anyone can get into the swing of Mario Golf! If you own this title on your Wii™, perform a system transfer from your Wii to your Wii U™ to receive a special upgrade price. This is the US version of the game.

PT.name: Mario Golf™
PT.description: Dá a primeira tacada com o Mario e os amigos, enquanto estes dão uma reviravolta ao golfe! Escolhe entre 14 personagens diferentes, cada uma com a sua própria potência e estilo de batida. Podes até provocar os adversários, para lhes perturbar a concentração! Mario Golf™ é um jogo repleto de atributos, incluindo 10 modos diferentes, tais como Tournament (Torneio), Speed Golf (Golfe Rápido) e até Mini-Golf (Minigolfe) e seis campos diferentes para jogar, nos quais terás de ganhar Experience Points (Pontos de Experiência) para avançar. Com uma jogabilidade fácil de aprender e um modo competitivo para quatro jogadores, todos podem dar uma tacada no Mario Golf! Caso já tenha adquirido este título para a sua Wii, faça uma transferência de dados da sua Wii™ para a sua Wii U™ com atualizações a um preço especial. Esta é a versão do jogo para os EUA.

RU.name: Mario Golf™
RU.description: Взгляните на гольф по новому, играя с Mario (Марио) и его друзьями! Выбирайте из 14 доступных персонажей, каждому из которых присущи уникальные способности и стили игры. Вы даже можете дразнить ваших оппонентов, отвлекая их от игры! Игра Mario Golf™ полна возможностей, включая 10 разных режимов игры, таких как Tournament (Турнир), Speed Golf (Гольф на время) и даже Mini-Golf (Мини-гольф), а также играйте на шести разных полях для гольфа, зарабатывая Experience Point (Очки опыта), необходимых для продвижения в игре. С легким и интуитивным геймплеем, а также режимом совместной игры до четырех игроков, Mario Golf придется по вкусу всем и каждому! Если вы приобрели игру на Wii™, вы можете передать ее на консоль Wii U™ и получить скидку на обновление игры до версии Wii U. Эта версия игры предназначена для продажи в США.
